remarks: Preimage maps produced by the "lower than or equal" relation are measurable sets.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Feb-2017.)
statement:
dstfrv.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) $.
dstfrv.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) $.
orvclteel.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
orvclteel $p |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC <_ A ) e. dom P ) $.
